about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 160: Big Nasty Beasts

This pack contains almost the exact same 22 tokens from Big Nasty Beasts, except now they have been animated by Teiva Roche and optimized for play on FGU by Doug Davison. This pack includes:
  • Behemoth
  • DragolichAncient
  • DragonAmethyst
  • DragonBlackThreeHead
  • DragonEmerald
  • DragonRuby
  • DragonSapphire
  • DragonTopazGS
  • DragonTopazYellow2
  • DragonTopazYellow
  • DragonVoidSmoke
  • DragonVoid
  • Kentimane2
  • Kentimane
  • KrakenWaterFoam
  • Kraken
  • Lichdragon_5headed
  • OrcWyvernRiderless
  • OrcWyvernRider
  • ScyllaWater
  • Scylla
  • Tarrasque
"
detailed_description:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 160: Big Nasty Beasts

This pack contains almost the exact same 22 tokens from Big Nasty Beasts, except now they have been animated by Teiva Roche and optimized for play on FGU by Doug Davison. This pack includes:
  • Behemoth
  • DragolichAncient
  • DragonAmethyst
  • DragonBlackThreeHead
  • DragonEmerald
  • DragonRuby
  • DragonSapphire
  • DragonTopazGS
  • DragonTopazYellow2
  • DragonTopazYellow
  • DragonVoidSmoke
  • DragonVoid
  • Kentimane2
  • Kentimane
  • KrakenWaterFoam
  • Kraken
  • Lichdragon_5headed
  • OrcWyvernRiderless
  • OrcWyvernRider
  • ScyllaWater
  • Scylla
  • Tarrasque
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
